titleStmt.title: The saints temptations wherein the nature, kinds, occasion of temptation, and the duty of the saints under temptation are laid forth : as also the saints great fence against temptation, viz. divine grace : wherein the nature, excellency, and necessity of the grace of God is displayed in several sermons / by John Rowe ...
titleStmt.author: Rowe, John, 1626-1677.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
